lidavidm commented on pull request #6747: ARROW-8183: [C++][Python][FlightRPC] Expose transport error metadata
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6747#discussion_r399836429
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/flight/internal.cc
 ##########
 @@ -196,7 +207,7 @@ Status FromGrpcStatus(const grpc::Status& grpc_status, grpc::ClientContext* ctx)
       return status;
     }
 
-    if (status.detail()) {
+    if (status.detail() && !arrow_status.detail()) {
 
 Review comment:
   This is going to lose information about the underlying error. I'd rather we parse out the extra error detail separately, and then add it to the existing FlightStatusDetail here, instead of completely overwriting it. If there isn't a FlightStatusDetail, then default to INTERNAL.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.

users@infra.apache.org

 cdef class FlightError(Exception):
     cdef dict __dict__

   ```suggestion
           super().__init__(message)
   ```

 cdef class FlightError(Exception):

+    def __init__(self, message='', extra_info=''):

lidavidm commented on pull request #6747: ARROW-8183: [C++][Python][FlightRPC] Expose transport error metadata
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6747#discussion_r399837112
 
 

 ##########
 File path: python/pyarrow/_flight.pyx
 ##########
 @@ -126,46 +127,57 @@ class CertKeyPair(_CertKeyPair):
 cdef class FlightError(Exception):
     cdef dict __dict__
 
+    def __init__(self, message='', extra_info=''):
+        Exception.__init__(self, message)
+        self.extra_info = tobytes(extra_info)
+
     cdef CStatus to_status(self):
         message = tobytes("Flight error: {}".format(str(self)))
         return CStatus_UnknownError(message)
 
+    def extra_info(self):
 
 Review comment:
   This getter is unnecessary and shadows the extra_bytes field.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

lidavidm commented on pull request #6747: ARROW-8183: [C++][Python][FlightRPC] Expose transport error metadata
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6747#discussion_r399836700
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/flight/internal.cc
 ##########
 @@ -266,6 +281,12 @@ grpc::Status ToGrpcStatus(const Status& arrow_status, grpc::ServerContext* ctx)
       const std::string detail_string = arrow_status.detail()->ToString();
       ctx->AddTrailingMetadata(internal::kGrpcStatusDetailHeader, detail_string);
     }
+    if (arrow_status.detail()) {
+      auto fsd = FlightStatusDetail::UnwrapStatus(arrow_status);
 
 Review comment:
   UnwrapStatus already takes care of when Status has a null StatusDetail: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/fd51e9d818036f57bd2da213dfe20c35597f1add/cpp/src/arrow/flight/types.cc#L67-L73

 Review comment:
   These are simple getter/setters so they should be named `extra_info` and `set_extra_info`.

fields.description: Expose grpc trailer as metadata to flight consumers in python and c++. Feature parity with Java after ARROW-8181
